org.qscript.eventsonfire

Class SwingEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qscript.eventsonfire.AWTEvents
      • org.qscript.eventsonfire.SwingEvents

  • public class SwingEvents
extends AWTEvents

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SwingEvents.EventsChangeListener
      A custom implementation of the change listener interface using either the specified producer or the source of the event.
      static class  SwingEvents.EventsListSelectionListener
      A custom implementation of the list selection listener interface using either the specified producer or the source of the event.
      static class  SwingEvents.EventsTreeSelectionListener
      A custom implementation of the tree selection listener interface using either the specified producer or the source of the event.

      • fireOnWindowsKeyStroke

        public static <TYPE extends JComponent> TYPE fireOnWindowsKeyStroke(TYPE producer,
                                                    String keyStroke,
                                                    String... tags)
        Registers a keystroke and an action to the component. Fires an action event, if the component that receives the keystroke is member of a focused window.
        Parameters:
        producer - the component
        keyStroke - the keystroke
        tags - some tags
        Returns:
        the component

      • fireOnWindowsKeyStroke

                                                    String... tags)

        Parameters:

        keyStroke - the keystroke
        tags - some tags
        Returns:

      • fireOnAncestorsKeyStroke

        public static <TYPE extends JComponent> TYPE fireOnAncestorsKeyStroke(TYPE producer,
                                                      String keyStroke,
                                                      String... tags)
        Registers a keystroke and an action to the component. Fires an action event, if an ancestor of the specified component receives the keystroke.
        Parameters:
        producer - the component
        keyStroke - the keystroke
        tags - some tags
        Returns:
        the component

      • fireOnKeyStroke

        public static <TYPE extends JComponent> TYPE fireOnKeyStroke(TYPE producer,
                                             String keyStroke,
                                             String... tags)
        Registers a keystroke and an action to the component. Fires an action event, if the component is focused and receives the keystroke.
        Parameters:
        producer - the component
        keyStroke - the keystroke
        tags - some tags
        Returns:
        the component

      • fireOnChange

        public static ChangeListener fireOnChange()
        Returns a change listener, that fires an event using the source of the event as producer.
        Returns:
        the change listener

      • fireOnChange

        public static ChangeListener fireOnChange(Object producer,
                          String... tags)
        Creates a change listener, that fires an event using the specified producer and the specified tags. If the producer is null, the source of the event will be used as producer.
        Parameters:
        producer - the producer
        tags - the tags
        Returns:
        the change listener

      • fireOnListSelection

        public static ListSelectionListener fireOnListSelection()
        Returns a list selection listener, that fires an event using the source of the event as producer.
        Returns:
        the list selection listener

      • fireOnListSelection

        public static ListSelectionListener fireOnListSelection(Object producer,
                                        String... tags)
        Creates a list selection listener, that fires an event using the specified producer and the specified tags. If the producer is null, the source of the event will be used as producer.
        Parameters:
        producer - the producer
        tags - the tags
        Returns:
        the list selection listener

      • fireOnTreeSelection

        public static TreeSelectionListener fireOnTreeSelection()

        Returns:
        the tree selection listener

      • fireOnTreeSelection

        public static TreeSelectionListener fireOnTreeSelection(Object producer,
                                        String... tags)

        Parameters:
        producer - the producer
        tags - the tags
        Returns:
        the tree selection listener
